isis.stitle: RADIATOR, REMOVE AND REPLACE - MXT - RADIATOR and Component INSTALLation - CHARGE AIR COOLER PIPES

svcproc.title: CHARGE AIR COOLER PIPES
svcproc.para: With the radiator assembly (cooling module) already installed, connect the CAC Pipes (Figure 28).

step1.para: Locate charge air cooler tubes and hoses. Inspect for dirt or particles and remove any dirt or particles.
Replace hose cuffs if deteriorated. Place constant tension spring clamps on pipe connections if hose cuffs are replaced.
Tighten the constant tension spring clamps on each end of the charge air cooler piping to the appropriate port on the turbo charger and engine manifold.
Position and secure the AC condenser lines with appropriate fasteners as required (refer to Table 1, Installation Torque Values).

item.para: Coat end of AC fitting with compressor oil (Texaco Capella WF68 or equivalent)
